Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (23/05/2022)
-------------------
- First Release

0.0.2 (23/05/2022)
-------------------
- Fixed minor bugs

0.0.3 (23/05/2022)
-------------------
- Fixed colors breaking when HWID not in database
- Added small text to say the script is authenticating you
- Cleaned code up for easier reading
- Removed unnecessary functions from package
